article_title: Paul Ryan to Give Speech on 'State of American Politics'
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: speaker, paul ryan, speech, state, american, politics

og.description:
House Speaker Paul Ryan has scheduled an address Wednesday on the  state of American politics,  The Hill reports. 
 The speaker will talk about how, in a confident America, we can elevate political debates to inspire and unite people,  a Ryan aide said.
The speech will take...
